title: Don't protect yourself in chat...
body:
You can't defend yourself when someone trash talks you, just got restricted for literally nothing, only thing i did was protect myself without using swear words from that guy who didn't play and talked trash about me and my team mates, and GUESS what? this guy who did nothing but spammed wards in base and trash talked me didn't get punished, riot is way beyond help, please replace your teams riot, they're actually autistic.
-
Just don't fight those kids.
